arts.ttl: Parma vs Torino: crucial 3 pts up for grabs
arts.sum: Parma and Torino have the worst attacks in Serie A 2025/26 so far, with just 1 goal scored each in the 360+ minutes played. The official head-to-head record between the two teams in Emilia is 20 matches with 10 Parma wins, 6 draws and 4 Torino victories.
